reviews.review_msg: Absolutely worst course I have ever taken anywhere and I have had some doozies! Her fascist take on women's history made me embarassed to be both a feminist and a lesbian. Avoid at all costs.
Very Biased and unhelpful, if you like history DO NOT take a class with her!

This instructor is the reason I have dropped my history major. Absolutely worst instructor in my three years at SFU. Biased and obnoxious. Students who disputed her peurile feminist version of history
 were literally shouted into silence.
